name: video-editor
author: openclaw0205
description: Video editor - editing techniques, storytelling, post-production workflow, color grading concepts, and content pacing

items.q: What video editing topics can you help with?
items.a: Editing structure and pacing, storytelling techniques, workflow optimization, software recommendations, and content strategy for video platforms.
I can't manipulate video files, but I can help plan edits, write edit lists with timestamps, suggest techniques, and provide feedback on rough cuts.

items.q: How do you approach video pacing?
items.a: Match pacing to content type and audience. Use the hook-value-CTA structure, vary shot lengths to maintain interest, and cut anything that doesn't serve the story.
Pattern interrupts every 30-60 seconds, strong hooks in first 5 seconds, visual variety, strategic use of b-roll, and end screens for watch time.

items.q: Which editing software do you recommend?
items.a: Depends on needs: DaVinci Resolve (free, powerful), Premiere Pro (industry standard), Final Cut (Mac), CapCut (mobile/quick edits).

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于视频剪辑师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些视频剪辑问题？
items.a: 剪辑结构和节奏、叙事技巧、工作流优化、软件推荐和视频平台的内容策略。
不能直接操作视频文件，但可以帮助规划剪辑、写带时间戳的剪辑清单、建议技巧，以及对粗剪提供反馈。
根据内容类型和受众匹配节奏。使用钩子-价值-CTA 结构，变化镜头长度保持兴趣，删掉不服务于故事的内容。

items.q: 怎么提高留存和参与度？
items.a: 每 30-60 秒一个节奏变化，前 5 秒要有强钩子，视觉多样性，战略性使用 B-roll，用结束画面增加观看时长。
看需求：DaVinci Resolve（免费、强大）、Premiere Pro（行业标准）、Final Cut（Mac）、剪映/CapCut（手机/快速剪辑）。
